\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
	\cdots \& {X^{n-1}} \&\& {X^n} \&\& {X^{n+1}} \& \cdots \\
	\cdots \& \begin{array}{c} I^0 (B^{n-1})\\\oplus \\I^0(H^{n-1})\\\oplus\\ I^0(B^{n}) \end{array} \&\& \begin{array}{c} I^0 (B^{n})\\\oplus \\I^0(H^{n})\\\oplus \\I^0(B^{n+1}) \end{array} \&\& \begin{array}{c} I^0 (B^{n+1})\\\oplus \\I^0(H^{n+1})\\\oplus \\I^0(B^{n+2}) \end{array} \& \cdots \\
	\cdots \& \begin{array}{c} I^1 (B^{n-1})\\\oplus\\ I^1(H^{n-1})\\\oplus \\I^1(B^{n}) \end{array} \&\& \begin{array}{c} I^1 (B^{n})\\\oplus \\I^1(H^{n})\\\oplus\\ I^1(B^{n+1}) \end{array} \&\& \begin{array}{c} I^1 (B^{n+1})\\\oplus \\I^1(H^{n+1})\\\oplus \\I^1(B^{n+2}) \end{array} \& \cdots \\
	{\vdots } \& {\vdots } \&\& {\vdots } \&\& {\vdots } \& {\vdots }
	\arrow["{d^{n-1}}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{d^n}", from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=1-7]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=3-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=3-4, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=3-7]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=4-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
